LanguageData.JRWEdaphosaurusReconstruct.label: Edaphosaurus
LanguageData.JRWEdaphosaurusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #0883-1940 [EDAPHOSAURUS BOANERGES] CODENAME: VERMILLION >512
A herbivorous synapsid known for lounging in the sun. Their bright red sails flare up when confronted with danger.
